page.title: 05A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ALICK
page.content: On a{Monday}I get up at 8 and dress.I go down stairs and have a plate of {Frosties}which is sugar frosted flakes of corn. Then I go and brush my hair, wash my teeth and face. I put on my coat and shoes and walk up to the shed to wait for the{school car.}We play for{15 minutes}before we go inside to work. At playtime a{mini {bus}comes and takes us swimming. We have{polystyrene floats}until we learn to swim. We go back to school at {12:00.}After dinner we play for a while. In the afternoon we have{art. We go home at{3:30.}I have a cup of tea and biscuit at home. I go out and feed the hens and my dad. Then I come in and watch{TV}till{6:00}when we have tea. I go out to play after then I watch{TV}till I go to bed at 9pm. {ALICK PIRIE (aged 9)
